question: In the brief analysis of the Book of Mormon we are told that there are namely three classes of record plates.
The Brass Plates of Laban are mentioned frequently in the Book of Mormon.
The body of the Book of Mormon, from Mosiah to Mormon, chapter #7, inclusive, is the translation of whose ____ abridgment of the Plates of Nephi.
The period covered in the Book of Mormon extends from B.C. 600 to A.D. 421.
Who was the last of the Nephite historians?
Moroni was the last of the Nephite historians that sealed the sacred record, and hid up unto the Lord.
In the Brief Analysis of the Book of Mormon, Joseph Smith mentions the hill Cumorah by name.
